trans-unit.source: List public IP addresses within a resource group
trans-unit.target: List public IP addresses within a resource group

trans-unit.source: See <link xlink:href="a4180f72-6387-413d-b217-189189bc7f37#bk_common" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Common parameters and headers</link> for headers and parameters that are used by all requests related to public IP addresses.
trans-unit.target: See <link xlink:href="a4180f72-6387-413d-b217-189189bc7f37#bk_common" xmlns:xlink="http://www.w3.org/1999/xlink">Common parameters and headers</link> for headers and parameters that are used by all requests related to public IP addresses.

trans-unit.source: The name of the Public IP Address.
trans-unit.target: The name of the Public IP Address.

trans-unit.source: The identifying URL of the Public IP Address.
trans-unit.target: The identifying URL of the Public IP Address.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the supported Azure location of the Public IP Address.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the supported Azure location of the Public IP Address.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see List all of the available geo-locations
trans-unit.target: For more information, see List all of the available geo-locations

trans-unit.source: The tags and their values that are used by the Public IP Address
trans-unit.target: The tags and their values that are used by the Public IP Address

trans-unit.source: System generated meta-data enabling concurrency control
trans-unit.target: System generated meta-data enabling concurrency control

trans-unit.source: Provisioning state of the Public IP Address
trans-unit.target: Provisioning state of the Public IP Address

trans-unit.source: Defines whether the IP address is stable or dynamic.
trans-unit.target: Defines whether the IP address is stable or dynamic.

trans-unit.source: Specifies the timeout for the TCP idle connection.
trans-unit.target: Specifies the timeout for the TCP idle connection.

trans-unit.source: The value can be set between 4 and 30 minutes
trans-unit.target: The value can be set between 4 and 30 minutes

trans-unit.source: Reference to a NIC’s IP Configuration if this Public IP Address is associated with a NIC
trans-unit.target: Reference to a NIC’s IP Configuration if this Public IP Address is associated with a NIC

trans-unit.source: The concatenation of the domain name label and the regionalized DNS zone make up the fully qualified domain name associated with the public IP address.
trans-unit.target: The concatenation of the domain name label and the regionalized DNS zone make up the fully qualified domain name associated with the public IP address.

trans-unit.source: If a domain name label is specified, an A DNS record is created for the public IP in the Microsoft Azure DNS system.
trans-unit.target: If a domain name label is specified, an A DNS record is created for the public IP in the Microsoft Azure DNS system.

trans-unit.source: Fully qualified domain name of the A DNS record associated with the public IP.
trans-unit.target: Fully qualified domain name of the A DNS record associated with the public IP.

trans-unit.source: This is the concatenation of the domainNameLabel and the regionalized DNS zone
trans-unit.target: This is the concatenation of the domainNameLabel and the regionalized DNS zone

trans-unit.source: A fully qualified domain name that resolves to this public IP address.
trans-unit.target: A fully qualified domain name that resolves to this public IP address.

trans-unit.source: If the reverseFqdn is specified, then a PTR DNS record is created pointing from the IP address in the in-addr.arpa domain to the reverse FQDN.
trans-unit.target: If the reverseFqdn is specified, then a PTR DNS record is created pointing from the IP address in the in-addr.arpa domain to the reverse FQDN.
